problem_text: (I. D. Macdonald). If the identity [x, y]^n = 1 holds on a group, is the derived subgroup of the group periodic? V. D. Mazurov
answer: No, not always (G. S. Deryabina, P. A. Kozhevnikov, Commun. Algebra, 27, no. 9 (1999), 4525–4530; S. I. Adyan, Dokl. Math., 62, no. 2 (2000), 174–176).
